original:
速度に関係なくこのスキルとマッチできる
[StartBattle] 敵の中で[Laceration]を持つ敵がいれば、全ての敵の[Laceration]を発動。[Laceration]回数が2減少
[WhenUse] 戦闘開始時に効果が発動しなかったら、[Laceration]30を得る
[WinDuel] [BloodDinner]を最大40消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき、[BloodArmor]1を得てダメージ量 +25%(最大100%)
- [BloodDinner]を消耗できなかったら、[Laceration]5を得て発動させる。[Laceration]回数が2減少
[EndSkill] このターンを終了
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
速度に関係なくこのスキルとマッチできる
[StartBattle] 敵の中で[Laceration]を持つ敵がいれば、全ての敵の[Laceration]を発動。[Laceration]回数が2減少
[WhenUse] 戦闘開始時に効果が発動しなかったら、[Laceration]30を得る
[WinDuel] [BloodDinner]を最大40消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき、[BloodArmor]1を得てダメージ量 +25%(最大100%)
- [BloodDinner]を消耗できなかったら、[Laceration]5を得て発動させる。[Laceration]回数が2減少
[EndSkill] このターンを終了
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
속도에 상관없이 이 스킬과 합을 할 수 있음
[StartBattle] 적 중 [Laceration]을 가진 적이 있다면, 모든 적의 [Laceration]을 발동시킴. [Laceration] 횟수 2 감소
[WhenUse] 전투 시작 시 효과가 발동하지 않았다면, [Laceration] 30 얻음.
[WinDuel] [BloodDinner]을 최대 40 소모하여, 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당, [BloodArmor] 1 얻고 피해량 +25% (최대 100%)
- [BloodDinner]을 소모하지 못했으면, [Laceration] 5 얻고 발동시킴. [Laceration] 횟수 2 감소
[EndSkill] 이번 턴 종료
EN:
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
[StartBattle] If there are enemies with [Laceration], activate [Laceration] on all enemies. All enemies lose 2 [Laceration] Count
[WhenUse] If this effect did not activate at Combat Start, gain 30 [Laceration].
[WinDuel] Consume up to 40 [BloodDinner]: for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed, gain 1 [BloodArmor] and deal +25% damage (max 100%)
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 5 [Laceration], and activate [Laceration] immediately. Lose 2 [Laceration] Count
[EndSkill] Ends this turn

original:
このスキルを使用するまで混乱状態にならない。
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[RegainedStrength]1を得て精神力を15回復
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]数値30につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大15)
[DefeatDuel] ダメージ量が半減し、このスキルのダメージで対象が混乱しない
[EndSkill] 増加したマッチ威力だけ、このターンと次のターンに[AttackDown], [DefenseDown]を得る。(最大15)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
このスキルを使用するまで混乱状態にならない。
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]を最大100消耗し、消耗した[BloodDinner]10につき[RegainedStrength]1を得て精神力を15回復
[WhenUse] 自分の[BloodDinner_Accumulation]数値30につき、マッチ威力 +1(最大15)
[DefeatDuel] ダメージ量が半減し、このスキルのダメージで対象が混乱しない
[EndSkill] 増加したマッチ威力だけ、このターンと次のターンに[AttackDown], [DefenseDown]を得る。(最大15)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
이 스킬을 사용하기 전까지 흐트러짐 상태가 되지 않음.
[WhenUse] [BloodDinner]을 최대 100 소모하여 소모한 [BloodDinner] 10당 [RegainedStrength] 1 얻고 정신력 15 회복
[WhenUse] 자신의 [BloodDinner_Accumulation] 수치 30당 합 위력 +1 (최대 15)
[DefeatDuel] 피해량이 50%만큼 감소하고 이 스킬의 피해로 대상이 흐트러지지 않음.
[EndSkill] 증가한 합 위력만큼 이번 턴과 다음 턴에 [AttackDown], [DefenseDown]를 얻음. (최대 15)
EN:
Cannot be Staggered until he uses this Skill.
[WhenUse] Consume up to 100 [BloodDinner]: gain 1 [RegainedStrength] and heal 15 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every [BloodDinner_Accumulation] by this unit (max 15)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% damage, and the damage from this Skill does not Stagger the target.
[EndSkill] For this turn and next turn, gain [AttackDown] and [DefenseDown] equal to the Clash Power gained with this Skill. (max 15)
